(RYO D I don't know but to me it seems that Koj is way to poweful and 
keeps getting new powers popping out of the wazoo. With all those 
attacks all you took was a gash to the shoulder? And in my post I 
said that the lance went into your throat because if you're pretty 
close to a person you can say if your weapons hit them. People may 
say that Vulois was too powerful, but that was the reason I got him 
out of he Peace story and trimmed him down. And people keep saying 
they shot at the Trainers but they were in cloak and in the sky so 
the really wouldn't hae any shadow. I know some people said they shot 
where Koj said Prebon was and that's fine, but others just said they 
shot at them.)

Starscream

Starscream answered Destructor.

"This mouse is in leage with Megatron. She knows his hiding. She's 
playing dumb, saying she thinks that this is Megatron's spark here. 
I'm taking her to the bring until KitKat can deal with her." He 
motioned ot her with his gun, "Let's go or you fry."
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers(Tamron)

Prebon saw all the fire power heading towards where the group was 
before. All sorts of Maximals were out fighting now. They had to be 
dealt with. He told the Trainers to lower themselves down so they 
were out fo range of Koj's jamming and scanned them. Most of them 
didn't have chips implanted in them. Time for new recruits. Secretly, 
Prebon gave the order to form the gestault Tamron, and he gave orders.

"Slayer, forget putting the wolf in stasis. Kill him. Savage, take 
out the Ark. If we can't win, we will destroy history!"

Tamron moved along towards the new bots. He fired two rockets around 
the area, and than launched two chips towards Maximals without the 
chip(Sky Lynx and Trinity) Savage flew up into the air and fired two 
fireballs down onto the main structure of the Ark.
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix and Fliq were installing computer boards on the Ark when they 
heard the battle outside. They ran out and saw two fireballs come 
down on the Ark.

"Savage....."

They both begna firing at where they thought the dragon was.
